name: Boo's Door
description:
Sullivan (main character) is modelled by me, on Blender 3.0

You can control Sullivan with (A and D or left and right buttons)

You must avoid the characters with red capsules and collect the green ones. They will give you energys. You have to collect 10 energys to win the game. 

You have 3 healths, when you touched the obstacles it will decrease your healths. If your health reaches 0, you will die.
